title: Weekday Zongzi
intro: This is a reimagined version of a Cantonese zongzi. This version highlights the benefits of eating pulses like mung beans to reach macronutrient goals.

context.note: traditionally glutonous rice is used, but any rice will work
replace with liquid from soaking dried shittake mushrooms if using
you can adjust water amount based on prefered texture
dried shiitake mushrooms are traditional, but any mushrooms will work
other cured meats such as bacon works as well

instructions.step: Rinse and combine **mung beans** and **rice**. Add **mixture** to rice cooker or pressure cooker
Wash **mushrooms** and dice into small pieces. Add to mixture
Dice **Chinese sausage** into small pieces. Add to mixture
Cook **mixture** in electric pressure cooker for 15 minutes on high pressure or normal setting in a rice cooker. Use natural release if using pressure cooker
mix cooked rice and beans with **lard or butter** before serving
